title: ARCS-Based University Ideology and Political Education Design

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational social science theories and comprehension of political systems
context.additional_context: Emphasizing job relevance for professionals while considering time constraints

learning_goals: Learners can design ideological education content by utilizing the four elements of the ARCS model (Attention, Relevance, Confidence, Satisfaction).
Learners can apply motivational strategies for political education at an 80% or higher rate through 15-minute microlearning modules in a mobile environment.
Learners can present three or more evaluation criteria for the suitability of the ARCS model based on real-world case analyses of instructional design in summative assessments.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
